text: hello how are you
I'm alright and you?
I thank you very much, with what you know about save the children
I don't know much about that charity all all.
you've donated something to the kids lately
I have not made a donation recently.

The Save the Children Fund, commonly known as Save the Children, is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That sounds like a decent organization.
the month that passed a full gift of 2 large clothes bags for these children, is a great pleasure when it helps
Okay that sounds good but how much would a donation of that size be?
children are the most valuable thing we have all are the future and should grow well healthy and full of knowledge
I suppose that is true.
tell me a bit about your life
I make money as a musician so basically I don't make money.
good, i take care of insurance and I like my job
Alright that's cool so how does this charity take its donations.
I posted every year a pack of any organization for kids
Okay so are you trying to get me to donate?
I wish that in the future you also donate some
Alright I will donate.
